Description: Two fragments of a child's loin-cloth of undyed cotton cloth, a and b, embroidered in blue cotton. Attached pendant apron in basket weave cotton cloth. c - with applied cotton cloth, d - and embroidered in blue and undyed thread. Loin-cloth originally triangular, outer edges rolled hems, a third piece of slightly different cloth. Embroidery consists of two blue discs circled by dots and joined by a stalk to outer corners; two double blue lines parallel to upper edge; a double blue line edging the central seam.
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
